minifaq.headline: Quick answers
minifaq.subtitle: The most important questions – answered clearly and honestly.

items.a: Yes. No ID documents or PDFs are sent by email. All documents are generated in the admin panel and remain under your control.

items.q: Can I separate studio work and conventions?
items.a: Yes. Using the event/convention mode with its own data capture and separate overview.

items.q: Does it work on smartphones and tablets?
items.a: Yes. Fully web-based and optimized for touch devices – no app installation required.

items.q: Can I generate PDFs again later?
items.a: Yes. The studio can generate, print, or save PDFs at any time from the admin panel.

card2.title: Under-18 safety that’s actually tight

faq.title: Quick questions, clear answers
faq.lead: The points studios actually care about.
faq.a1: Yes. Self-hosting is possible – you’re not forced into a cloud. That’s the point: control over data and operations.
faq.q2: How does under-18 handling work in practice?
faq.a2: Below minimum age: guardian data, signatures and required uploads become mandatory. Without them, the form cannot be submitted.
faq.a3: The studio anytime in the admin area. Clients shouldn’t have to request PDFs via email later – that can be a privacy problem.
faq.a4: Yes, optional. Only with explicit consent. Unsubscribe anytime – and proof (time/source) is traceable.
